Reviews.Title: Added to my secirity system
Reviews.Author: Fred Smead Sayeg
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera. The best thing about this camera is that it has a wide field of view. The worst thing about this camera is that it has a wide field of view. So I had to mount it close to the door. Not really good for long range survellience, but it's perfect for anything closer than 30 ft or so.It was easy to set up and since it has a fixed lens, it's always in focus. Another plus is PoE which makes installation a lot easier. However, if you're not using PoE, it has a power supply which can be connected.
